message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a high-quality item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Can you meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $150. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $175.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $160?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking to stay within your budget. I'm willing to make another concession and sell the product to you for $170. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $170 and my original offer of $150. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $160?
